#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<stdlib.h>

using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        long long int r,x,y,x0,y0,v;
        scanf("%lld%lld%lld%lld%lld%lld",&r,&x,&y,&x0,&y0,&v);
        
        double dis=sqrt(pow(x-x0,2)+pow(y-y0,2));
        double remain;
        if(dis>=r)
            remain=0.0;
        else
           remain=(r-dis)/(double)v;
        printf("%.6lf\n",remain);
           
    }
    return 0;
}
